translations: n.点击数；滴答声（click 的复数）
v.点击；作滴答声（click 的单三形式）

phrs.translation: 点击这里，点击此处；单击此处

sentences.sentence: He moves the cursor, clicks the mouse.
Tabs should appear in the same location as the user clicks from one tab to another.
sentences.translation: 当用户点击一个选项卡到另一个选项卡时，标签应该出现在同一位置。

sentences.sentence: It is these that absorb whale "clicks": Rough weather generates more bubbles than usual.
sentences.translation: 恶劣天气中产生的气泡比平时更多，正是这些气泡吸收了鲸鱼发出的“滴答声“。
